title: FT: T206 Joe Lake no ball American Beauty 460 SGC 40 for other AB460s
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: FT: T206 Joe Lake no ball American Beauty 460 SGC 40 for other AB460s
posts.post_content:
I have this super nice looking Joe Lake no ball AB460.  Condition is sharp SGC 40.  

I'm looking to trade this for another AB460 (or 2) that I don't have.  Not interested in any of the 12 easier ones.  Flexible on condition.  Happy to take back a little cash or add cash as necessary.  

PM or email me at [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url] to discuss.
